body_content.explanation: the fact of involving sexual activity between people who are closely related and not legally allowed to marry:
examples: It’s a tale of Gothic incestuousness based on a novel by an Atlanta author.

body_content.explanation: the quality of involving only a close or limited group of people, who do not communicate or do business with people outside the group:
examples: People are tired of the revolving-door incestuousness of Washington and Wall Street.
Political incestuousness is routine at all levels.
